channel.title: Posts on Geoffrey's travel blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Geoffrey's travel blog

item.title: Over 29 hours later ...
item.description: Finally arrived after a very long trip. I didn’t end up having much time in either Sydney or Dubai but overall the flights were ok and I watched a few movies. Mostly about women trying to change their boyfriends and it not working. Anyway, I got to Barcelona and got a bus to the centre of town. I then got the subway to the AirBnB I am staying at. The woman here is very nice and helpful and the area looks interesting to walk around.

item.title: Leaving Auckland
item.description: Good-bye Auckland! Barcelona here I come!
